headline: Earnings Preview: What To Expect From Ecolab’s Report
summary: Ecolab is gearing up to release its fiscal fourth-quarter earnings in February, and analysts project a double-digit earnings increase.

headline: Water.org Partners with Gap Inc., Amazon, Starbucks, and Ecolab to Launch Get Blue™, Advancing Water.org's Goal of Reaching 200 Million People by 2030
summary: Water.org, Gap Inc., Amazon, Starbucks, and Ecolab today announced the launch of Get Blue™. The global initiative is designed to accelerate access to safe water and sanitation by aligning business leadership, consumer engagement, and capital behind Water.org's proven, market-driven solutions, reaching families and communities in need around the world.
